welcome_message_body: "Welcome to beautiful Broadstone, where the charm of small-town England meets the excitement of a bustling city. Known for its stunning landscapes and friendly locals, we invite you to explore and enjoy all that this charming town has to offer!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Bournemouth International Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport terminal.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Yeovilton Airport handles all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Yeovilton Airport is used for private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Southampton Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: South Terminal
terminals.description: The South Terminal at Southampton Airport is primarily used for low-cost carriers and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
